Summary: large spherical object:pulsating orange in color then dimmed out like a light and disappeared
trends: There have been no other sightings in Port Clinton
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking out trash and noticed a pulsating orange object in thesky.I looked at it for a few seconds and then it was if someone was dimming a light and then it disappeared right in front of my eyes.It was like nothing i have ever seen before.It made no noise at all.Fr om what i saw, it was not a craft of this earth. It was amazing. It definatley was not a man made craft and if it was the government is hiding things from us again like usual.They need to finally come clean and let us know what is going on.
